errors.invalidManagerRating: Manager rating must be between 1 and 5
errors.cannotCreateDifferentOrg: Cannot create employee in different organization
errors.insufficientPermissionsStats: Insufficient permissions to view organization statistics

placeholders.searchEmployees: Search by name, email, or employee ID...

validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
validation.invalidPhone: Please enter a valid phone number
validation.invalidHourlyRate: Hourly rate must be a positive number
validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters

errors.mustBeSubmittedForApproval: Form must be submitted before approval
errors.mustBeSubmittedForRejection: Form must be submitted before rejection

section1.title: Employee Information and Attestation
section1.citizenshipStatus: I am aware that federal law provides for imprisonment and/or fines for false statements or use of false documents in connection with the completion of this form.
section1.attestation: I attest, under penalty of perjury, that I am (check one of the following boxes):
section1.usCitizen: A citizen of the United States
section1.nonCitizenNational: A noncitizen national of the United States

section2.title: Employer or Authorized Representative Review and Verification
section2.instructions: Employees must provide acceptable documentation to establish identity and employment authorization.
section2.listA: List A: Documents that Establish Both Identity and Employment Authorization
section2.listB: List B: Documents that Establish Identity
section2.listC: List C: Documents that Establish Employment Authorization

personalInfo.city: City or town, state, and ZIP code

filingStatus.marriedJoint: Married filing jointly or Qualifying widow(er)

legal.atWillText: Employment with this company is at-will. Either the employee or the company may terminate the employment relationship at any time, with or without cause, and with or without notice.
legal.antiHarassmentText: This company is committed to providing a workplace free from harassment based on race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability, or any other protected characteristic.
legal.equalOpportunityText: This company is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability, or any other protected characteristic.

errors.onboardingSessionAlreadyExists: An active onboarding session already exists for this employee
errors.tokenEmployeeMismatch: Token does not match the specified employee
errors.tokenTooShort: Token must be at least 6 characters
errors.additionalHoursRequired: Additional hours must be a positive number

notifications.completedMessage: {{employeeName}} has completed their onboarding process at {{organizationName}}. Please review and approve their submission.
notifications.approvedMessage: {{employeeName}}'s onboarding has been approved and sent to HR for final processing.
notifications.rejectedMessage: {{employeeName}}'s onboarding has been rejected. The employee has been notified to make corrections.

errors.documentTypeAndEmployeeRequired: Document type and employee ID are required
errors.unsupportedFileType: File type {mimeType} is not supported for {documentType} documents. Allowed types: {allowedTypes}
errors.fileTooLarge: File size exceeds the limit of {maxSize} for {documentType} documents

instructions.i9Requirements: Please upload a clear, legible copy of your completed Form I-9. Both sides must be visible if using a physical copy.
instructions.w4Requirements: Upload your completed W-4 form. Ensure all required fields are filled out and the form is signed.
instructions.ssnRequirements: Upload a clear photo or scan of your Social Security card. Ensure all numbers are clearly visible.
instructions.driversLicenseRequirements: Upload both front and back of your driver's license. All text must be clearly readable.
instructions.handbookRequirements: This is your employee handbook. Please review and acknowledge receipt.
instructions.policyRequirements: Please review this company policy document carefully.
instructions.experienceLetterInfo: This is your employment experience letter for your records.

notification.subject: Schedule Update
notification.details: Here are the details of your updated schedule:
notification.loginToView: Please log in to the employee portal to view your complete schedule.

reversion.subject: Schedule Reversion Notice
reversion.details: Your temporary schedule for the following dates has ended and your regular schedule is now in effect:

errors.invalidTimeFormat: Invalid time format. Please use HH:MM format
errors.endTimeBeforeStartTime: End time cannot be before start time
errors.invalidBreakDuration: Break duration must be less than shift duration
errors.insufficientPermissions: You do not have permission to manage this schedule
errors.effectiveUntilBeforeFrom: Effective until date must be after effective from date

notifications.connectedMessage: You are now connected to receive real-time notifications
